com.github.katjahahn.tools

Class Hasher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.tools.Hasher

  • public class Hasher
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates hash values of PE files and sections.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hasher(PEData data)
      Creates a hasher instance for the data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] computeHash(java.io.File file, java.security.MessageDigest digest, long from, long until)
      Computes the hash value for the file bytes from offset from until offset until, using the hash instance as defined by the hash type.
      static byte[] fileHash(java.io.File file, java.security.MessageDigest messageDigest)
      Returns the hash value of the file for the specified messageDigest.
      byte[] fileHash(java.security.MessageDigest messageDigest)
      Returns the hash value of the file with the messageDigest.
      static void main(java.lang.String... args) 
      static Hasher newInstance(java.io.File file) 
      byte[] sectionHash(int sectionNumber, java.security.MessageDigest messageDigest)
      Returns the hash value of the section with the section number and the messageDigest.

      • fileHash

        public byte[] fileHash(java.security.MessageDigest messageDigest)
                throws java.io.IOException

      • sectionHash

        public byte[] sectionHash(int sectionNumber,
                 java.security.MessageDigest messageDigest)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the hash value of the section with the section number and the messageDigest.

        The section's size must be greater than 0, otherwise the returned array has zero length.

        Parameters:
        sectionNumber - the section's number
        messageDigest - the message digest algorithm
        Returns:
        hash value of the section with the section number
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

                        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • fileHash

        public static byte[] fileHash(java.io.File file,
              java.security.MessageDigest messageDigest)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the hash value of the file for the specified messageDigest.
        Parameters:
        file - to compute the hash value for
        messageDigest - the message digest algorithm
        Returns:
        hash value of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • computeHash

        public static byte[] computeHash(java.io.File file,
                 java.security.MessageDigest digest,
                 long from,
                 long until)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Computes the hash value for the file bytes from offset from until offset until, using the hash instance as defined by the hash type.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to compute the hash from
        digest - the message digest instance
        from - file offset to start from
        until - file offset for the end
        Returns:
        hash value as byte array
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
